snippet: Mr. Grassley, the Iowa Republican who is chairman of the Senate Judiciary Committee, sent letters to the Justice Department and the Treasury asking for details about the decision.
abstract: Iowa Sen Charles E Grassley sends letters to Justice Dept and Treasury asking them to disclose details of 2012 decision to divert Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac earnings to Treasury; shareholders have been pressing mortgage giants for years to reveal specifics of plan, which forgoes repayment to taxpayers that was established under original bailout agreement.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Grassley, the Iowa Republican who is chairman of the Senate Judiciary Committee, sent letters to the Justice Department and the Treasury asking for details about the decision.

headline.main: Charles Grassley Questions Diversion of Fannie and Freddie Earnings
headline.print_headline: Senator Questions Diversion of Fannie and Freddie Earnings

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
